name: Release Engineer
description:
The primary objective of this position is to administer regular builds and releases of software products.

Responsibilities:

  • Monitor and manage source control and configuration management systems

  • Administer regular builds and releases

  • Maintain the CI/CD infrastructure

  • Work with internal software configuration systems

  • Manage internal and development tools

  • Infrastructural support of Product Development projects

Required skills:

  • Knowledge of software version control tools and processes

  • Knowledge of Git version control system

  • Basic knowledge of at least one scripting language (Bash, Python, PowerShell)

  • Ability to perform basic operating system administration

Preferred skills:

  • Linux containers

  • Configuration management systems (Ansible or others)

  • GitLab, TeamCity, Jenkins

  • Experience with RPM package building

  • Experience with building or maintaining CI/CD pipelines

Working Conditions:

  • Medical and dental insurances for employee and his/her family

  • Free meals in the office

  • English classes twice a week
